button.pay.description: Text in the button used to pay for the order.

button.continuePay.description: Text in the button used to continue paying for the order.

button.checkDetail.description: Text in the button used to view order details.

button.query.description: Text in the button used to query the order.

button.finish.description: Text in the button used to manually complete the order.

button.update.description: Text in the button used to update the order.

field.amount.description: The point amount of the order.

field.price.description: The point amount of the order.

field.createdAt.description: The creation time of the order.

field.payWay.description: The payment method for the order.

field.proxy.description: Proxy is an online service that refers to an HTTP proxy used for data transmission.

message.orderExpired.message: The order has expired, please create a new order to proceed with payment.

message.wechatPayHelp.message: Please open WeChat on your phone and scan to complete the payment

message.buyInExternalUrl.message: Please complete the payment in the external link
message.buyInExternalUrl.description: Message for payment via external link.

message.confirmFinish.message: This action will manually set the order to paid status and complete the distribution process, which cannot be undone. Please confirm that the customer has completed the payment, do you want to continue?

state.pending.description: The status of the order, indicating that the order is still waiting for the user to make a payment.

state.paid.description: The status of the order, indicating that the order has been paid.

state.finished.description: The status of the order, indicating that the order has been completed.

state.expired.description: The status of the order, indicating that the order has expired.

state.failed.description: The status of the order, indicating that the payment for the order has failed.

title.info.description: The title displayed on the website, indicating order information.

title.wechatPay.description: The title displayed on the website, indicating WeChat Pay.

title.aliPay.description: The title displayed on the website, indicating Alipay payment, which is an online payment method.

title.stripe.description: The title displayed on the website, indicating Stripe payment, which is an online payment method.

title.manageOrder.description: The title displayed on the website, indicating order management.

title.x402.description: The title displayed on the website, indicating cryptocurrency payment (based on the X402 payment solution).

message.discountTag.description: Badge text displaying the applied discount percentage.

message.discountHint.message: You are our exclusive VIP customer and can automatically enjoy a {percent}% discount.
message.discountHint.description: Message explaining that the user automatically enjoys a discount due to VIP status.

message.x402DiscountApplied.message: Enjoy an additional {percent}% OFF discount when paying through X402.
message.x402DiscountApplied.description: Used to explain the additional discount brought by X402 payment.

message.x402DiscountTag.description: Highlight the discount percentage that can be additionally enjoyed by choosing X402 payment.

message.x402DiscountHint.message: Choose X402 payment to instantly enjoy an additional {percent}% OFF discount.
message.x402DiscountHint.description: Message explaining to users that they can unlock additional discounts through X402 payment.

message.x402IntroShort.message: Select wallet to complete USDC payment directly.

message.x402TabWallet.description: Title for the wallet payment tab.

message.x402WalletTitle.description: Title for X402 wallet quick payment (USDC).

message.x402WalletConnected.description: Label displayed when the wallet is connected.

message.x402ConnectWallet.description: Button text for connecting EVM wallet.

message.x402NoWalletDesc.message: Please use a browser that supports wallets (recommended Chrome/Brave), or install the MetaMask/Phantom extension; you can also open this page in the built-in browser of your mobile wallet app.
message.x402NoWalletDesc.description: General description when no wallet is available.

message.x402SwitchNetwork.message: Please switch the wallet network to {network}
message.x402SwitchNetwork.description: Message prompting the user to switch to the specified chain network.

message.x402SolanaNotEnabled.message: Solana X402 backend is not yet enabled.
message.x402SolanaNotEnabled.description: Prompt when the order does not have Solana X402 enabled.

message.x402NeedConnectAccount.description: Reminder displayed when the wallet is not connected.

message.x402ConfirmTitle.description: Title for the X402 payment confirmation popup.

message.x402ConfirmDesc.description: Description for the X402 payment confirmation popup.

message.x402Step1.message: Connect your wallet (if not installed, please install the extension first, then refresh this page or open this page with your mobile wallet)

message.x402Step2.message: Modify wallet settings, confirm the wallet network is {network}

message.x402Step3.message: Click 'Pay with Wallet', complete the authorization signature in the wallet

message.x402Step4.message: After successful signing, we will automatically settle, and this page will automatically update to paid

message.x402IntegrationResourceLabel.description: Label for the payment interface address.

message.x402IntegrationPayToLabel.description: Label displaying the blockchain settlement address.

message.x402IntegrationNetworkLabel.description: Label displaying the blockchain network name.

message.x402IntegrationFallback.message: Failed to retrieve complete session data, please refer to the development documentation or contact support for necessary parameters.
message.x402IntegrationFallback.description: Message displayed when session data cannot be retrieved.

message.x402IntegrationDocsCta.description: Call to action text for opening the developer guide.

message.x402InstallGuideTitle.description: Title for wallet installation instructions popup.

message.x402InstallGuideDesc.message: Please follow the steps below to complete the installation of the {wallet} extension, then use the button below to refresh this page to re-detect the wallet.
message.x402InstallGuideDesc.description: Description guiding users to complete wallet extension installation.

message.x402InstallGuideStep1.message: Open the newly opened page to download and install the {wallet} browser extension (recommended Chrome/Brave).

message.x402InstallGuideStep2.message: Complete the extension installation, log in/unlock, and ensure it is enabled in the current browser profile.

message.x402InstallGuideStep3.message: Return to this page, click 'I have installed' to refresh and try 'Connect Wallet' again.

message.x402InstallGuideConfirm.description: Main button after completing wallet installation.

message.x402NetworkGuideTitle.description: Title for network mismatch explanation popup.

message.x402NetworkGuideDesc.message: Please follow the steps below to switch the wallet network to {network}, and refresh this page to re-detect after completion.
message.x402NetworkGuideDesc.description: Description guiding users to adjust wallet network.

message.x402NetworkGuideStep1.message: Open the wallet extension, go to Settings -> Active Networks.

message.x402NetworkGuideStep2.message: In the network list, confirm that {network} (or other specified networks) is enabled; if it is enabled, you can skip this step.
message.x402NetworkGuideStep2.description: Second step explanation for adjusting the network, no need to disable Ethereum.

message.x402NetworkGuideStep3.message: Return to this page, click 'I have completed the setup' to refresh and try payment again.

message.x402NetworkGuideConfirm.description: Main button after completing network settings.

message.x402NetworkSwitchFailed.message: The current wallet does not support automatic network switching, please manually switch to the specified network in the wallet and try again.
message.x402NetworkSwitchFailed.description: Message prompting the user that the wallet does not support automatic network switching and needs to switch manually.

message.x402PaymentFailed.message: X402 wallet payment failed, please try again later. If it fails multiple times, please contact support and provide the error information.
message.x402PaymentFailed.description: General error prompt when X402 wallet payment fails.

message.x402WalletPayCta.description: Button text for completing payment with the connected wallet.

button.refund.description: Text in the button used to manually refund the order.

field.applicationId.description: The application ID to which the order belongs.

field.serviceId.description: The service ID corresponding to the discount.

field.generalDiscount.description: The label displayed when the discount applies to all services.

field.userId.description: The user ID that enjoys the discount.

field.discount.description: The discount rate applied to the user's order.

field.actions.description: The title of the action button column.

message.confirmRefund.message: This action will revoke the rights of this order and mark it as refunded, which cannot be undone. Please confirm that the refund has been processed, do you want to continue?

message.x402IntegrationIntro.message: The current order uses the X402 payment protocol, please complete the integration on the server side based on the parameters below and initiate the payment.
message.x402IntegrationIntro.description: Introduction message for using the X402 protocol.

message.x402IntegrationProtocol.message: Call the facilitator payment interface and complete the signature broadcast. After successful settlement, return to this page to confirm the status.
message.x402IntegrationProtocol.description: Explanation of the steps to complete X402 payment.

message.x402IntegrationDocsHint.message: Want to know more details? Please check the development documentation below.
message.x402IntegrationDocsHint.description: Message reminding users they can get more information through the development documentation.

message.x402WalletTitleEvm.description: Title for EVM wallet connection card.

message.x402WalletTitleSolana.description: Title for Solana wallet connection card.

message.x402WalletConnectTitle.description: Title for WalletConnect QR code popup.

message.x402WalletConnectOpenWallet.description: Button text for invoking the wallet via WalletConnect on mobile.

message.x402WalletConnectScanHint.message: Please use a wallet that supports WalletConnect to scan the QR code.
message.x402WalletConnectScanHint.description: Hint text below the WalletConnect QR code.

message.x402NoWalletTitle.description: Title when no EVM wallet is injected in the browser.

message.x402NoWalletSafariDesc.message: Safari typically does not support extensions like MetaMask, it is recommended to use Chrome/Brave, or open this page in the built-in browser of your mobile wallet app.
message.x402NoWalletSafariDesc.description: Description for no wallet in Safari environment.

message.x402ConnectWC.description: Button text for connecting with WalletConnect.

message.x402RefreshDetect.description: Button text for re-detecting the wallet.

message.x402MissingWCProjectId.message: WalletConnect Project ID not configured (please set the environment variable VITE_WALLETCONNECT_PROJECT_ID)
message.x402MissingWCProjectId.description: Prompt for missing WalletConnect project ID.

message.x402WalletBound.description: Badge displayed when the wallet is bound.

message.userIdRequired.description: Prompt displayed when the user ID is empty.

message.serviceIdRequired.description: Prompt displayed when the service ID is empty.

message.discountRequired.message: Please enter a discount between 0 and 1.
message.discountRequired.description: Prompt displayed when the discount is not within the valid range.

message.discountCreated.description: Message displayed when a new discount is successfully created.

message.discountUpdated.description: Message displayed when a discount is successfully edited.

message.discountDeleted.description: Message displayed when a discount is successfully deleted.

state.refunded.description: The status of the order, indicating that the order has been refunded.

title.revenueAnalysis.description: Title for the revenue analysis page.

title.last7dRevenue.description: Revenue amount for the last week.

title.last30dRevenue.description: Revenue amount for the last 30 days.

title.last90dRevenue.description: Revenue amount for the last 90 days.

title.revenueTrend.description: Title for the revenue trend line chart.

title.manageOrderDiscount.description: Title for the order discount management page.

title.discountLookup.description: Title for the section displaying the user's current discounts.

title.createDiscount.description: Title for the section to create a new discount.

title.updateDiscount.description: Title for the edit discount popup.
